The code for DFS:

recursive subroutine dfs(current_length)

  implicit none
  integer, intent(in) :: current_length
  integer :: num
  integer :: i, local_length
  integer*8 :: score

  local_length = current_length 

  if (local_length == n) then
    ! compute score
    score = 0 do i = 1, q
      if ( list(b(i)) - list(a(i)) == c(i) ) then
        score = score + d(i)
      endif
    enddo
    if (score > ans) then
      ans = score
    endif
    return
  endif

  if (local_length == 0) then
    do num = 1, m 
      list(1) = num
      call dfs( local_length + 1 )
    enddo
  else
    do num = list(local_length), m 
      list( local_length + 1 ) = num
      call dfs( local_length +1 )
    enddo
  endif
end subroutine dfs

   ! Read inputs

   read(*,*) n, m, q

   allocate( a(q), b(q), c(q), d(q) )

   integer :: i

   do i=1, q
      read(*,*) a(i), b(i), c(i), d(i)
   enddo

   !

recursive subroutine dfs(current_length)
   integer, intent(in) :: current_length
   ! variables accessed from main program: list, a, b, c, d, q, n, ans.
   integer :: num, i
   integer(kind=8) :: score

   if (current_length == n) then  ! compute score
      score = 0
      do i = 1, q
         if ( list(b(i)) - list(a(i)) == c(i) ) then
            score = score + d(i)
         endif
      enddo

      if ( score > ans ) then
         ans = score
      endif
      return
   endif

   if ( current_length == 0 ) then
      do num = 1, m
         list(1) = num
         call dfs(current_length + 1)
      enddo
   else
      do num = list(current_length), m
         list(current_length + 1) = num
         call dfs(current_length +1 )
      enddo
   endif
end subroutine
